Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Diversey, Kedzie, & Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Diversey, Kedzie, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Kedzie.
ShortDescription: EB 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, & the Blue Line, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Kedzie, and the Blue Line, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Kedzie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
